short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to generate Creative Commons license in place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose Creative Commons License (CC License) you want.
The code is generated in place, so you can copy it to place in your web site.
Some languages are available.
